search.queryText:
(_sourceCategory=*fortigate* !(vpn))
| parse " rcvddelta=*" as rcvddelta nodrop
| parse "sentdelta=* " as sentdelta nodrop
| parse "appcat=\"*\"" as appcat nodrop
| parse "rcvdpkt=* " as rcvdpkt nodrop
| parse "sentpkt=* " as sentpkt nodrop
| parse "rcvdbyte=* " as rcvdbyte nodrop
| parse " sentbyte=* " as sentbyte nodrop
| parse " duration=* " as duration nodrop
| parse " transport=* " as transport nodrop
| parse "transip=* " as transip nodrop
| parse "trandisp=\"*\"" as trandisp nodrop
| parse "srccountry=\"*\"" as srccountry nodrop
| parse "dstcountry=\"*\"" as dstcountry nodrop
| parse "service=\"*\"" as service nodrop
| parse "policytype=\"*\" " as policytype nodrop
| parse "policyid=* " as policyid nodrop
| parse "proto=* " as proto nodrop
| parse "sessionid=* " as sessionid nodrop
| parse " poluuid=\"*\" " as poluuid nodrop
| parse " dstintfrole=\"*\" " as dstintfrole nodrop
| parse " dstintf=\"*\" " as dstintf nodrop
| parse "dstport=* " as dstport nodrop
| parse " dstip=* " as dstip nodrop
| parse "srcintfrole=\"*\"" as srcintfrole nodrop
| parse "srcintf=\"*\"" as srcintf nodrop
| parse "srcport=* " as srcport nodrop
| parse "srcip=* " as srcip nodrop
| parse "role=\"*\"" as role nodrop
| parse "action=\"*\" " as action nodrop
| parse " msg=\"*\"" as msg nodrop
| parse "logdesc=\"*\"" as logdesc nodrop
| parse " eventtime=* " as eventtime nodrop
| parse "vd=\"*\"" as vd nodrop
| parse "level=\"*\"" as level nodrop
| parse " subtype=\"*\" " as subtype nodrop
| parse " type=\"*\"" as type nodrop
| parse " logid=\"*\"" as logid nodrop
| parse "devid=\"*\"" as devid nodrop
| parse "devname=\"*\"" as devname nodrop
| parse " time=* " as time nodrop
| parse "date=* " as date nodrop
| where service = "udp/443"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_name, state from geo://location on ip=dstip
| count by action, srcip, dstip, dstcountry, country_name
//| where country_name != dstcountry
| sort by _count

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event user
| parse "<*>date=* time=* devname=\"*\" devid=\"*\" logid=\"*\" type=\"*\" subtype=\"*\" level=\"*\" vd=\"*\" eventtime=* logdesc=\"*\" srcip=\"*\" user=\"*\" authserver=\"*\" action=\"*\" status=\"*\" msg=\"*\"" as pid,date,time,devname,devid,logid,type,subtype,level,vd,eventtime,logdesc,srcip,user,authserver,action,status,msg
| parse "type=\"*\" subtype=\"*\"" as type,subtype
| where type = "event"
| where subtype = "user"

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| extract "logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\" "
| where type = "event"
| where !isNull(logdesc)
| count as eventCount by logdesc
| compare with timeshift 1d
| sort by eventCount, eventCount_1d, logdesc

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "Security Rating summary"
| parse regex "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".*audittime=(?<auditTime>\d{1,15}) auditscore=\"(?<auditScore>.*?)\" criticalcount=(?<criticalCount>\d{1,5}) highcount=(?<highCount>\d{1,5}) mediumcount=(?<mediumCount>\d{1,5}) lowcount=(?<lowCount>\d{1,5}) passedcount=(?<passedCount>\d{1,5})"
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| extract "logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\" "
| where type = "event" and logdesc = "Security Rating summary"
| max(audittime) as auditDate group by deviceName, auditScore,criticalCount,highCount,mediumCount,lowCount,passedCount
| auditDate *1000 as auditDate
| formatDate(toLong(auditDate),"MM-dd-yyyy") as auditDate
| avg(auditScore)

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| extract "logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\" "
| extract "devname=\"(?<devname>.*?)\" "
| extract "vd=\"(?<vd>.*?)\" "
| extract "subtype=\"(?<subtype>.*?)\" "
| extract "level=\"(?<level>.*?)\" "
| extract "action=\"(?<action>.*?)\" "
| extract "msg=\"(?<msg>.*?)\""
| where type = "event"
| formatDate(_messageTime, "MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss") as messagedate
| count messagedate, devname, vd, subtype, level, action, msg
| order by messagedate
| fields - _count

panels.title: Most Recent Audit Scores by Device

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "Security Rating summary"
| parse regex "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".*audittime=(?<auditTime>\d{1,15}) auditscore=\"(?<auditScore>.*?)\" criticalcount=(?<criticalCount>\d{1,5}) highcount=(?<highCount>\d{1,5}) mediumcount=(?<mediumCount>\d{1,5}) lowcount=(?<lowCount>\d{1,5}) passedcount=(?<passedCount>\d{1,5})"
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| extract "logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\" "
| where type = "event" and logdesc = "Security Rating summary"
| max(audittime) as auditDate group by deviceName, auditScore,criticalCount,highCount,mediumCount,lowCount,passedCount
| auditDate *1000 as auditDate
| formatDate(toLong(auditDate),"MM-dd-yyyy") as auditDate

panels.title: Audit Score Description
panels.text:
The Security Fabric Audit assigns a numeric score for the security of your network. The score can be positive or negative, with a higher score representing a more secure network.


The Score is based on the number of audit checks failed and the severity of those checks, with the following weights being assigned to each severity:
* Critical: 50 points
* High: 25 points
* Medium: 10 points
* Low: 5 points

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*fortigate* type
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| where type = "event"
| count

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| extract "logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\" "
| where type = "event"
| where !isNull(logdesc)
| timeslice 2m
| count by _timeslice, logdesc
| transpose row _timeslice column logdesc

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| where type = "event"
| timeslice 2m
| count by _timeslice
| outlier _count window=10,threshold=3,consecutive=1,direction=+-

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* dstip srcip traffic
| extract "(?:srcip|dstip)=(?<ip_address>.*?) " multi
| count as ip_count by ip_address
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=ip_address
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where  type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
|sum (ip_count) as threat_count

panels.title: Accepted to Denied Traffic Ratio Outlier

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\""
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| extract "action=\"(?<action>.*?)\" "
| where type= "traffic"
| if(action matches "accept",1,0) as accept
| if(action matches "deny",1,0) as deny
| timeslice 5m
| sum(deny) as denies, sum(accept) as accepts by _timeslice
| accepts/denies as accept_deny_ratio
| outlier accept_deny_ratio window=10,threshold=3,consecutive=1,direction=+-

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* 
| extract "action=\"(?<action>.*?)\" "
| count as eventCount by action
| compare with timeshift 1d
| sort by eventCount, eventCount_1d

_sourceCategory=*fortigate*
| parse regex "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\""
| count_distinct(deviceName)

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| where type = "event"
| count

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| extract "subtype=\"(?<subtype>.*?)\" "
| where type = "event"
| count by subtype

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| extract "logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\" "
| where type = "event"
| where !isNull(logdesc)
| timeslice 5m
| count by _timeslice, logdesc
| transpose row _timeslice column logdesc

_sourceCategory=*fortigate*
| extract "(?:srcip|dstip)=(?<ip_address>.*?) " multi
| count by ip_address
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=ip_address
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| extract field=label_name "ThreatType\-\>(?<threat_type>.*?) "
| where type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as actor
| count by malicious_confidence

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* level
| extract "level=\"(?<level>.*?)\" "
| where !isNull(level)
| timeslice 5m
| count level, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column level

_sourceCategory=*fortigate*
| extract "(?:srcip|dstip)=(?<ip_address>.*?) " multi
| count by ip_address
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=ip_address
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| extract field=label_name "ThreatType\-\>(?<threat_type>.*?) "
| where type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as actor
| count by malicious_confidence, threat_type
| transpose row malicious_confidence column threat_type

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND "action=\"accept\"" 
| parse "action=\"*\"" as action 
| parse "srcip=* " as srcip
| where action="accept"
| where !(srcip matches "10.*") OR !(srcip matches "172.[16-31].*") OR !(srcip matches "192.168.*")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, area_code, metro_code from geo://location on ip = srcip
| where country_name !="" AND !isNull(country_name) 
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, area_code, metro_code

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "Security Rating summary"
| parse regex "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".*audittime=(?<auditTime>\d{1,15}) auditscore=\"(?<auditScore>.*?)\" criticalcount=(?<criticalCount>\d{1,5}) highcount=(?<highCount>\d{1,5}) mediumcount=(?<mediumCount>\d{1,5}) lowcount=(?<lowCount>\d{1,5}) passedcount=(?<passedCount>\d{1,5})"
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| extract "logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\" "
| where type = "event" and logdesc = "Security Rating summary"
| max(audittime) as auditDate group by deviceName, auditScore,criticalCount,highCount,mediumCount,lowCount,passedCount
| auditDate *1000 as auditDate
| formatDate(toLong(auditDate),"MM-dd-yyyy") as auditDate
| avg(auditScore)

panels.title: Total Bandwidth Served in MBs by Device

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" sentbyte
| extract "sentbyte=(?<sentbyte>.*?) "
| extract "rcvdbyte=(?<rcvdbyte>.*?) "
| extract "devname=\"(?<devname>.*?)\" "
| sentbyte/1024/1024 as sentMB
| rcvdbyte/1024/1024 as rcvdMB
| sentMB+rcvdMB as MBTotal
| timeslice 5m
| sum(MBTotal) as totalMBs by _timeslice, devname
| transpose row _timeslice column devname

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics"
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
|where deviceName matches "{{deviceName}}"
|avg(cpu) as avgCPU by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics"
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
| avg(diskLogRate) as avgDazLogRate by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics"
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 15m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
|where deviceName matches "{{deviceName}}"
|avg(mem) as avgMemory by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics"
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
|where deviceName matches "{{deviceName}}"
|avg(fazLogRate) as avgFazLogRate by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics"
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
|where deviceName matches "{{deviceName}}"
|avg(down) as avgDownloadSpeed by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics"
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) "
| timeslice 15m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
|where deviceName matches "{{deviceName}}"
|avg(setupRate) as avgSetupRate by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics"
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) "
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
|where deviceName matches "{{deviceName}}"
|avg(totalSession) as avgTotalSessions by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics"
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
|where deviceName matches "{{deviceName}}"
|avg(disk) as avgDisk by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics"
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
|where deviceName matches "{{deviceName}}"
|avg(up) as avgUploadSpeed by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics" {{deviceName}}
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) "
| timeslice 15m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
| avg(setupRate) as avgSetupRate by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics" {{deviceName}}
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) "
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
| avg(totalSession) as avgTotalSessions by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics" {{deviceName}}
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
| avg(cpu) as avgCPU by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics" {{deviceName}}
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 15m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
| avg(mem) as avgMemory by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics" {{deviceName}}
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
| avg(disk) as avgDisk by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

panels.title: Total Bandwidth Served in MBs by Device

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" sentbyte
| extract "sentbyte=(?<sentbyte>.*?) "
| extract "rcvdbyte=(?<rcvdbyte>.*?) "
| extract "devname=\"(?<devname>.*?)\" "
| sentbyte/1024/1024 as sentMB
| rcvdbyte/1024/1024 as rcvdMB
| sentMB+rcvdMB as MBTotal
| timeslice 5m
| sum(MBTotal) as totalMBs by _timeslice, devname
| transpose row _timeslice column devname

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics" {{deviceName}}
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
| avg(down) as avgDownloadSpeed by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics" {{deviceName}}
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
| avg(fazLogRate) as avgFazLogRate by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics" {{deviceName}}
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
| avg(up) as avgUploadSpeed by deviceName,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column deviceName

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics"
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| timeslice 5m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
| avg(diskLogRate) as avgDazLogRate by deviceName,_timeslice

sourceDefinition.query:
_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics"
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) "
| timeslice 15m
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*fortigate* srcip
| extract "srcip=(?<srcip>.*?) "
| count by srcip
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=srcip 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as actor
| sum(_count) as threatCount by malicious_confidence
| sort by threatCount, malicious_confidence asc

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* srcip
| extract "srcip=(?<srcip>.*?) "
| count by srcip
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=srcip 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as actor
| sum(_count) as threatCount by Actor
| sort by threatCount, Actor asc

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* dstip
| extract "dstip=(?<dstip>.*?) "
| count by dstip
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=dstip
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as actor
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = dstip
| where !isNull(latitude)

panels.title: Threat Intel
panels.text: Potential threats are analyzed from the CrowdStrike Integrated Threat Intelligence feed. For details please refer to https://help.sumologic.com/07Sumo-Logic-Apps/22Security_and_Threat_Detection/Threat_Intel_Quick_Analysis/03_Threat-Intel-FAQ. The threat feed is updated once per day.

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=*fortigate* dstip
| extract "dstip=(?<dstip>.*?) "
| count by dstip
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=dstip 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as actor
| sum(_count) as threatCount by malicious_confidence
| sort by threatCount, malicious_confidence asc

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* srcip
| extract "srcip=(?<srcip>.*?) "
| count as ip_count by srcip
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=srcip
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where  type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
|sum (ip_count) as threat_count

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* dstip
| extract "dstip=(?<dstip>.*?) "
| count by dstip
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=dstip
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as actor
| fields dstip, actor, malicious_confidence, label_name

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* dstip
| extract "dstip=(?<dstip>.*?) "
| count by dstip
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=dstip 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as actor
| sum(_count) as threatCount by Actor
| sort by threatCount, Actor asc

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* srcip
| extract "srcip=(?<srcip>.*?) "
| count by srcip
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=srcip
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as actor
| fields srcip, actor, malicious_confidence, label_name

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* dstip
| extract "dstip=(?<dstip>.*?) "
| count as ip_count by dstip
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=dstip
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where  type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
|sum (ip_count) as threat_count

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* srcip
| extract "srcip=(?<srcip>.*?) "
| count by srcip
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=srcip
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where type="ip_address" and !isNull(malicious_confidence)
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as actor
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = srcip
| where !isNull(latitude)

(_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND "action=\"deny\"" )
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| extract "action=\"(?<action>.*?)\" " 
| timeslice 2m
| where type = "traffic" and action = "deny"
| count by _timeslice 
| outlier _count window=10,threshold=3,consecutive=1,direction=+-

(_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" app*)
| parse "appcat=\"*\"" as app
| parse "sentbyte=* " as bsnt 
| sum(bsnt) as bytes_sent  by app | sort by -bytes_sent | limit 10

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" 
| extract "srcip=(?<srcip>.*?) "
| count_distinct(srcip) as sources

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND ("action=\"accept\"" OR "action=\"deny\"")
| parse "action=\"*\"" as action 
| parse "srcip=* " as srcip 
| parse "dstip=* " as dstip
| where action="accept" or action="deny"
| if ((srcip matches "10.*") OR (srcip matches "172.[16-31].*") OR (srcip matches "192.168.*"), 1, 0 ) as outbound
| if (outbound == "0", 1, 0) as inbound
| if (action="deny", 1, 0) as denied
| timeslice 5m
| sum(inbound) as inbound, sum(outbound) as outbound, sum(denied) as denied by _timeslice
| sort by _timeslice asc

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* devtype
| extract "osname=\"(?<osname>.*?)\" " nodrop
| extract "devtype=\"(?<devtype>.*?)\" " nodrop
| extract "osversion=\"(?<osversion>.*?)\" " nodrop
| concat (osname, " ", osversion) as operatingsystem
| count devtype, operatingsystem
| sort by _count
| limit 10

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* traffic
| extract "dstip=(?<dstip>.*?) "
| count_distinct(dstip) as destination_ips

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND "action=\"accept\"" 
| parse "action=\"*\"" as action 
| parse "srcip=* " as srcip
| where action="accept"
| where !(srcip matches "10.*") OR !(srcip matches "172.[16-31].*") OR !(srcip matches "192.168.*")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, area_code, metro_code from geo://location on ip = srcip
| where country_name !="" AND !isNull(country_name) 
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, area_code, metro_code

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* 
| extract "action=\"(?<action>.*?)\" " 
| count as eventCount by action
| compare with timeshift 1d
| sort by eventCount, eventCount_1d

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND "action=\"deny\"" 
| parse "action=\"*\"" as action 
| parse "srcip=* " as srcip
| where action="deny"
| where !(srcip matches "10.*") OR !(srcip matches "172.[16-31].*") OR !(srcip matches "192.168.*")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, area_code, metro_code from geo://location on ip = srcip
| where country_name !="" AND !isNull(country_name) 
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, area_code, metro_code

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND "action=\"accept\"" 
| parse "action=\"*\"" as action 
| parse "srcip=* " as srcip 
| count as count srcip 
| sort by count 
| limit 10

(_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND "action=\"accept\"" )
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| extract "action=\"(?<action>.*?)\" "
| timeslice 2m
| where type= "traffic" and action="accept"
| count by _timeslice
| outlier _count window=10,threshold=3,consecutive=1,direction=+-

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND "action=\"deny\"" 
| parse "action=\"*\"" as action 
| parse "srcip=* " as srcip 
| where action="deny"
| count as count srcip 
| sort by count 
| limit 10

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" sentbyte
| extract "sentbyte=(?<sentbyte>.*?) "
| extract "rcvdbyte=(?<rcvdbyte>.*?) "
| sentbyte/1024/1024 as sentMB
| rcvdbyte/1024/1024 as rcvdMB
| sentbyte+rcvdbyte as byteTotal
| timeslice 5m
| sum(sentMB) as sent_MBs, sum(rcvdMB) as received_MBs by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" 
| extract "srcip=(?<srcip>.*?) "
| count_distinct(srcip) as sources

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* traffic
| extract "dstip=(?<dstip>.*?) "
| count_distinct(dstip) as destination_ips

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* devtype
| extract "osname=\"(?<osname>.*?)\" " nodrop
| extract "devtype=\"(?<devtype>.*?)\" " nodrop
| extract "osversion=\"(?<osversion>.*?)\" " nodrop
| concat (osname, " ", osversion) as operatingsystem
| count devtype, operatingsystem
| sort by _count
| limit 10

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* 
| extract "action=\"(?<action>.*?)\" " 
| count as eventCount by action
| compare with timeshift 1d
| sort by eventCount, eventCount_1d

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" sentbyte
| extract "sentbyte=(?<sentbyte>.*?) "
| extract "rcvdbyte=(?<rcvdbyte>.*?) "
| sentbyte/1024/1024 as sentMB
| rcvdbyte/1024/1024 as rcvdMB
| sentbyte+rcvdbyte as byteTotal
| timeslice 5m
| sum(sentMB) as sent_MBs, sum(rcvdMB) as received_MBs by _timeslice

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND ("action=\"accept\"" OR "action=\"deny\"")
| parse "action=\"*\"" as action 
| parse "srcip=* " as srcip 
| parse "dstip=* " as dstip
| where action="accept" or action="deny"
| if ((srcip matches "10.*") OR (srcip matches "172.[16-31].*") OR (srcip matches "192.168.*"), 1, 0 ) as outbound
| if (outbound == "0", 1, 0) as inbound
| if (action="deny", 1, 0) as denied
| timeslice 5m
| sum(inbound) as inbound, sum(outbound) as outbound, sum(denied) as denied by _timeslice
| sort by _timeslice asc

(_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" app*)
| parse "appcat=\"*\"" as app
| parse "sentbyte=* " as bsnt 
| sum(bsnt) as bytes_sent  by app | sort by -bytes_sent | limit 10

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND "action=\"deny\"" 
| parse "action=\"*\"" as action 
| parse "srcip=* " as srcip
| where action="deny"
| where !(srcip matches "10.*") OR !(srcip matches "172.[16-31].*") OR !(srcip matches "192.168.*")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, area_code, metro_code from geo://location on ip = srcip
| where country_name !="" AND !isNull(country_name) 
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, area_code, metro_code

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND "action=\"deny\"" 
| parse "action=\"*\"" as action 
| parse "srcip=* " as srcip 
| where action="deny"
| count as count srcip 
| sort by count 
| limit 10

(_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND "action=\"deny\"" )
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| extract "action=\"(?<action>.*?)\" " 
| timeslice 2m
| where type = "traffic" and action = "deny"
| count by _timeslice 
| outlier _count window=10,threshold=3,consecutive=1,direction=+-

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND "action=\"accept\"" 
| parse "action=\"*\"" as action 
| parse "srcip=* " as srcip
| where action="accept"
| where !(srcip matches "10.*") OR !(srcip matches "172.[16-31].*") OR !(srcip matches "192.168.*")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, area_code, metro_code from geo://location on ip = srcip
| where country_name !="" AND !isNull(country_name) 
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, area_code, metro_code

_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND "action=\"accept\"" 
| parse "action=\"*\"" as action 
| parse "srcip=* " as srcip 
| count as count srcip 
| sort by count 
| limit 10

(_sourceCategory=*fortigate* "type=\"traffic\"" AND "action=\"accept\"" )
| extract "type=\"(?<type>.*?)\" "
| extract "action=\"(?<action>.*?)\" "
| timeslice 2m
| where type= "traffic" and action="accept"
| count by _timeslice
| outlier _count window=10,threshold=3,consecutive=1,direction=+-

search.queryText:
((((_sourceCategory=*fortigate* event "System performance statistics"))))
| extract "devname=\"(?<deviceName>.*?)\".* type=\"(?<type>.*?)\".*logdesc=\"(?<logdesc>.*?)\".*cpu=(?<cpu>\d{1,10}) mem=(?<mem>\d{1,10}) totalsession=(?<totalSession>\d{1,10}) disk=(?<disk>\d{1,10}) bandwidth=\"(?<down>\d{1,10})\/(?<up>\d{1,10})\" setuprate=(?<setupRate>\d{1,3}) disklograte=(?<diskLogRate>\d{1,5}) fazlograte=(?<fazLogRate>\d{1,5}) " nodrop
| where type = "event"
| where logdesc = "System performance statistics"
